name: count_txt_file_length
description: Calculate the length of a .txt file in units of Chinese characters and English words, with optional exclusion of punctuation and numbers.

file_path.description: Relative path to the .txt file to be analyzed.

include_punctuation.description: Whether to include punctuation characters in the count. Default is true.

include_numbers.description: Whether to include numeric characters in the count. Default is true.
